option.name: Image + Thumbs on the bottom, Info area
Info area, Image + Thumbs on the bottom

field.name: Product images in top section
field.description: Select and add Asset category images in the top section. Videos are not supported

Sql.query: SELECT * FROM EcomDetailsGroup groups JOIN EcomDetailsGroupTranslation translation ON groups.EcomDetailsGroupId = translation.DetailsGroupTranslationGroupId WHERE translation.DetailsGroupTranslationLanguageId = (SELECT TOP 1 LanguageId FROM EcomLanguages WHERE LanguageIsDefault = 1)

field.name: Collect all downloads
field.description: Collect all downloads in one section

field.name: Product detail fields
field.description: Replace the Product detail fields with a Display group

Sql.query: SELECT TOP 25 * FROM EcomFieldDisplayGroups groups LEFT JOIN EcomFieldDisplayGroupTranslation translation ON groups.FieldDisplayGroupSystemName = translation.FieldDisplayGroupTranslationGroupSystemName WHERE groups.FieldDisplayGroupAvailableInFrontend = 1 AND translation.FieldDisplayGroupTranslationLanguageId = (SELECT LanguageId FROM EcomLanguages WHERE LanguageIsDefault = 1) ORDER BY groups.FieldDisplayGroupSortIndex

field.name: Display groups layout
field.description: Shows all display groups where "Use in frontend" is enabled

field.name: Video assets
field.description: Replace Video field with Assets categories

Sql.query: SELECT * FROM EcomDetailsGroup groups JOIN EcomDetailsGroupTranslation translation ON groups.EcomDetailsGroupId = translation.DetailsGroupTranslationGroupId WHERE translation.DetailsGroupTranslationLanguageId = (SELECT TOP 1 LanguageId FROM EcomLanguages WHERE LanguageIsDefault = 1)

field.name: Download assets
field.description: Replace Download section with Assets categories

Sql.query: SELECT * FROM EcomDetailsGroup groups JOIN EcomDetailsGroupTranslation translation ON groups.EcomDetailsGroupId = translation.DetailsGroupTranslationGroupId WHERE translation.DetailsGroupTranslationLanguageId = (SELECT TOP 1 LanguageId FROM EcomLanguages WHERE LanguageIsDefault = 1)

field.name: Render variant groups in table
field.description: As columns in the variants list table. This setting does not properly support simple variants.

field.name: Table columns
field.description: Max 4. Use as few as possible.

Sql.query: /****** Script for SelectTopNRows command from SSMS ******/ SELECT TOP 1000 [ProductFieldId] ,[ProductFieldName] ,[ProductFieldSystemName] ,[ProductFieldTemplateName] ,[ProductFieldTypeId] ,[ProductFieldTypeName] ,[ProductFieldLocked] ,[ProductFieldSort] ,[ProductFieldListPresentationType] ,[ProductFieldAutoId] ,[ProductFieldDoNotRender] FROM [EcomProductField]

field.name: Table columns
field.description: Max 4. Use as few as possible.

Sql.query: /****** Script for SelectTopNRows command from SSMS ******/ SELECT TOP 1000 [ProductFieldId] ,[ProductFieldName] ,[ProductFieldSystemName] ,[ProductFieldTemplateName] ,[ProductFieldTypeId] ,[ProductFieldTypeName] ,[ProductFieldLocked] ,[ProductFieldSort] ,[ProductFieldListPresentationType] ,[ProductFieldAutoId] ,[ProductFieldDoNotRender] FROM [EcomProductField]

field.name: Hide image for each Family variant
